response.overview: Three detectives in the corrupt and brutal L.A. police force of the 1950s use differing methods to uncover a conspiracy behind the shotgun slayings of the patrons at an all-night diner.
response.tagline: Everything is suspect... Everyone is for sale... And nothing is what it seems.
response.title: L.A. Confidential

titles.title: L.A. Confidential - Jeder hat seinen Preis

results.name: Kim Basinger winning Best Supporting Actress
